project.title: Education Management System (EMS)
project.description: An Education Management System (EMS) designed to streamline the educational workflow of university courses. This EMS centralizes key functionalities, including quiz assessments, an agile project management system, and a group assessment system. It enables students to collaborate on software projects for their clients while managing all their interactions and evaluations within the platform.
responsible: Role: Project Manager, UI/UX Designer, Full Stack Developer
Managing a freelance project and execute end-to-end development using the MERN stack for full-stack implementation.
Managed module development on Jira, coordinating with team members, and providing guidance.
Design the UI/UX of the web application using Figma and implement the design on the frontend.
Develop the backend system using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
Implement bulk data processing using BullMQ and Redis for the student registration system.
Tech Stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, Typescript, Docker, Figma, Jira, PlantUML, BullMQ, Redis

project.title: The AI-Enhanced Fish Recognition for eNelayan Marketplace Platform
project.description: A fishery product marketplace that provides a platform for fishermen to sell their fishery products.
responsible: Design and develop a hybrid mobile app that is compatible to Android and IOS
Implement RESTful API backend system on Laravel and use MySQL as a database.
Design and implement fishery image product search by using Google Vision Product Search.
Design the database schema that align to the fishery product marketplace business model.

project.title: OpenHub
project.description: A marketplace-based web application that provides a innovative way for open scientific environment to bridge a connection among the potential collaborator, open-source project and project creators. A hackathon project that only involves frontend development.
responsible: Design and develop the web frontend.
Leading the team to complete the project within the timeline.
Propose the project idea that aligned to feasible solution for the open scientific environment.

project.title: UniFlea
project.description: A ecommerce web application that providing a platform for university user to easy to sell their pre-loved items. This is a project built with the technique of Laravel, Vue JS and Vuetify. The project built is in C2C business mode.
responsible: Design the database schema and implement the database migration and seeder
Implement MVC development pattern on Laravel and use MySQL as a database.
Implement InertiaJS, Vue and Vuetify for the frontend development
Design and develop the modules of UserDashboard, Report User, User Order Tracking, Item Sell Tracking, User Profile and Item Sale Details

project.title: MapTest
project.description: A self-taught android application that assists the users in daily life which help user to record their map searching record into the local storage.
responsible: Implement mobile development on Android Studio with Java and use SQLite as local database.
Huawei Mobile Service (HMS) SDK Map kit and Site kit integration
Design and develop the modules of Search location, Set Record and Record History
